column5: I flew from Toronto Island to Peterborough and back this aft.  Still a couple small ice slabs floating on both lakes, but they are 95% clear, I'm guessing both lakes will be totally clear by Friday, if not before.  I heard lk St John by Orillia is clear as well, still some ice on most the other lakes up there though.
22Degreed on Friday and 23 on Sunday...the ice will be gone this weekend hopefully
Scugog is fully open.. and the fish are biting
